dict.acceptation: 信用，信任；宗教信仰；忠诚；宗教；

sent.orig: Welcome to Spring at Faith Radio Online-Simply to Relax, I'm Faith.
sent.trans: 欢迎来到Faith轻松电台的春天。

sent.orig: Nihility-faith-social faith-personal God faith, this is the total logic of this paper.
sent.trans: 虚无——信仰——社会信仰——个人上帝信仰，这是本文总的逻辑。

sent.orig: People of faith, joy and faith of the people are happy. Because of her faith.
sent.trans: 有信仰的人是快乐的，有信仰的人是幸福的。因为她有信仰。

sent.orig: Blind faith in science is no improvement upon blind faith in religion.
sent.trans: 和对宗教的盲目信仰面前相比，对科学的盲目信仰根本就不是一个进步。

sent.orig: Seeing it is one God, which shall justify the circumcision by faith, and uncircumcision through faith.
sent.trans: 30神既是一位他就要因信称那受割礼的为义，也要因信称那未受割礼的为义。
